thread.title: J.P. Morgan Names Former Army Chief of Staff Raymond Odierno as Adviser
thread.title_full: J.P. Morgan Names Former Army Chief of Staff Raymond Odierno as Adviser - WSJ

author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: J.P. Morgan Names Former Army Chief of Staff Raymond Odierno as Adviser
text:
J.P. Morgan Chase & Co. said Thursday that it has brought on Gen. Raymond T. Odierno, the recently retired chief of staff of the Army, as a senior adviser to the firm, effective Sept. 1.
Gen. Odierno will advise the board and Chief Executive Jamie Dimon on topics such as country risk analysis, technology and physical and cyber security....
